maqras.text: When the Sky is rent asunder. (The high Space will be explored and Astronomy will bring knowledge of the Cosmos)
It will listen to its Lord for that is what it has been decreed to do
And when the earth is spread out. (It becomes widely inhabited)
And casts out whatever is in it and becomes void. (The earth will bring forth its fossils and minerals through Archaeology, drilling and mining)
It will listen to its Lord for that is what it has been decreed to do
O Man! Behold, You have been toiling hard toward your Lord - painfully toiling - then you shall meet Him
Then whoever is given his Book in his right hand, (The follower of this Revelation is indeed blessed, for)
He truly reckons the decisions of his life with ease
And returns rejoicing to his folk (the Ideologically synchronous minds)
But as for him who is given his Book behind his back (he who has turned his back to the Book, looking back to the ancestral traditions)
He will be inviting upon himself chaos
And enter the Blazing Flame
Behold, he used to enjoy the company of his own kind
For, behold, he deemed that life would never quit revolving like this
Nay, but behold, his Lord did see all his mettle. ('Bihi' = In him = His true worth = His mettle)
Oh, I call to witness the Rosy Afterglow of sunset
And the Night and all that it enshrouds
And the Moon as it steadily grows to her fullness

That you will traverse higher and higher from one plane to another. (Civilizations will keep advancing in sciences, and individuals will always have a chance to grow in goodness. Furthermore, evolution of the 'Self' will carry on in the life to come)
What, then, is the matter with them that they believe not (in a higher form of life)
And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they prostrate not! (They adore not and humble themselves not before the eloquence, Wisdom and Majesty of the Divine Word)
Nay, but the rejecters belie
And Allah is best Knower of what they hide. (Their idols, peer pressure, traditions, malice, schemes, vested interests)
So give them the tiding of an awful doom
Except to those who choose to be graced with belief and do acts that help people - for them is a reward unending
The sky full of constellations stands witness
And the Promised Day (when you see the Truth triumph over Falsehood)
And He Who watches, and that which is being watched (will see that)
Destroy themselves all those who dig ditches for others
Igniting the fire of rage
Behold, they contemplate and wait in anticipation
And they are well aware of what they are doing to the believers
Whom they hate for no other reason than that they believe in Allah, the Almighty, the Owner of Praise.(
And to Whom belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth. But Allah is Watcher over all things
Behold, those who persecute the believing men and the believing women, and then repent not, theirs, verily, is the doom of Hell - yes, theirs is the doom of burning
Verily, those who choose to be graced with belief and do actions that help people, theirs are the Gardens underneath which rivers flow. That is the Great Eminence
(Yet) Verily, strong is the Grip of your Lord
Behold, He it is Who originates (life) and then makes again and again
And He is the Forgiving, the Loving
Lord of the Supreme Throne
Carrying out His Plan according to His Laws. ('Fe'l' = Doing = Carrying out. 'Ma Yurid' = As He plans = As He wills = In accordance with His Laws)
Has the story reached you of the great troops
Of Pharaoh and Thamud
And yet the rejecters knowingly live in denial
But Allah surrounds them without them conceiving it. ('Minwwaraihim' = From behind them = Without them conceiving it)
Nay, but this is Sublime Qur'an
(Inscribed) upon Tablet Imperishable
The sky and the Tariq are witness to what is being said
And what will enlighten you as to what the Tariq is
The Brightest Star! The noble night-visitant with the Radiant Lamp of the Qur'an in his hand knocking at the doors of minds and hearts, giving Light
There is no person without a watch being kept over him. (The Law of Requital is ever-vigilant)
Let the human being, then, consider out of what he has been created. (And realize the common origin of all mankind. Has there not passed over man an era when he was not even worth mentioning)
He has been created from a turbulent water. (2)
That issued from between tough rocks and mingled dust
Now, verily, He (Who has thus created man), is well Able to bring him back
On the Day when all secrets will be disclosed
Then he will have no power, nor a helper
Witness is the high atmosphere that keeps returning (its water, gases and other composition)
And witness is the earth which cracks open for springs and plants
Behold, this (Qur'an) is a Conclusive Word. (That can give you a new life)
It is not an amusing idle talk
(Yet) Behold, they plot and scheme (to refute the Truth)
But My Law works its own Way
Therefore give the rejecters some time. Leave them alone for a while
